des: "Northern Germany is big on fish! This is a delicious spread that goes well on toasted bread as a starter, and it's so easy!"
ins: Remove any skin and bones from the mackerel, and place into the bowl of a food processor. Pulse until no large pieces remain.  Add the cream cheese, butter, and lemon juice; process until smooth.  Place into a small serving bowl, and refrigerate until firmed, about 2 hours.
